snippet: EISEN--Miriam R.,on December 31, age 94, died peacefully at home. Survived by three children, four grandchildren and one great-grandchild....

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EISEN, MIRIAM R.

lead_paragraph: EISEN--Miriam R.,on December 31, age 94, died peacefully at home. Survived by three children, four grandchildren and one great-grandchild.
